CustomField.formula: if( nbavs__RecordingUUID1__c = "", IMAGE("/resource/nbavs__playbuttons/PlayOff.png", "No Recording was made"),if(nbavs__RecordingUUID1__c = "No Recording was made", IMAGE("/resource/nbavs__playbuttons/PlayOff.png", "No Recording was made"),HYPERLINK('/apex/nbavs__playrecordaction?id='+Id, IMAGE("/resource/nbavs__playbuttons/PlayOn.png", "Play"))))
CustomField.label: Natterbox Call Recording
